title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
description: When changing the text in StyledText with word wrap enabled, the redraw process becomes inefficient.
OB: 1. Open StyledText editor with word wrap enabled.
EB:
1. Open StyledText editor with word wrap enabled. 
2. Edit the text by adding or deleting characters.
SR:
To investigate the inefficient redraw process, add the following line to the performPaint method inStyledText.java: 
System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight);
